attributes.additional_details:
Not only will it make safer and reduce the spread of Covid but it will stop a disgusting habit.

As a dentist having learnt about the mouth, saliva, salivary glands and  flow rates I do not understand the need for people to constantly spit in public.
Even professional football players do it then roll around in each others spit.
attributes.background:
To pass a law that makes people spitting in public illegal.
It is a disgusting habit- people constantly spitting on the streets right next to other people.
Now even during Covid with the spreading of diseases people continue to spit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568966
